import React from 'react' import ReactCardFlip from "react-card-flip"; import "../static/style.css" export default function FlipCard(props) {; let {movieObj,vote_average,genreid,handleRemoveFromWatchList,name,watchList,poster_path} = props; const popularity = Math.round(movieObj.popularity,2); return (
handleRemoveFromWatchList(movieObj)} className="absolute flex justify-center items-center h-9 w-9 rounded-lg"> ❌

{movieObj.title}

Genre {genreid}

Views {popularity}

Rating {movieObj.vote_average}

) }
